snippet.title: Power Drift (1990) [PCE] - RetroArch with Beetle SuperGrafx
snippet.description:
Power Drift is a kart racing game released in arcades by Sega in 1988. More technologically advanced than Sega's earlier 2.5D racing games, like Hang-On and Out Run, in Power Drift the entire world and track consist of sprites.
--
This is the official second but simplest page of @LibRetro for #RetroArch. Our goal is to share the game videos we got while using our cores. The performance of  the content is to differ from content to content and from core to core.

Don't forget to follow our pages below.

https://libretro.com/
https://retroarch.com/
https://www.youtube.com/Libretro
--
Version: 1.9.14
System: PC (GTX 1080, Ryzen 7 1800x, 32GB 2800Mhz)
Core: Beetle SuperGrafx
